actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Talons

actions.description: The hawk casts Plane Shift on itself, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.
actions.name: Plane Shift (2/Day)
